column3: Ratio value of Fishing subsidy to landed value
column4: Ecological footprint or primary prod required (PPR)
column5: Marine trophic index (MTI): change in the average value of MTI in the 2000s from that in the 1950s
column6: Fishing in Balance index (FiB): change in the average value of FIB in the 2000s from that in the 1950s
column7: Stock status (number): number of stocks in the collapsed and overexploited stages as a % of the total number of stocks between 2000-2010
column8: Stock status (biomass): catch biomass of stocks in the collapsed and overexploited stages as % of the total catch biomass between 2000-2010
column9: Catch from bottom trawling gears as % of total catch
column10: Rate of change of effective fishing effort ( kW) from the mean of the 1980s to the mean of the 2000s
column11: % change in catch potential in the 2050s
